attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Brown.

We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Act immediately to secure the release of the 2 kidnapped British subjects currently held in Nigeria's Delta region since 9th September 2008.

There are 2 British subjects currently held captive in the Niger Delta, in Nigeria. They have been held captive for 80 days now (Today 27-11-08)

The major reason for their continued detention is the Prime Minister, Mr Gordon Brown's pledge to assist the Federal Government of Nigeria’s' military with assistance & training.

This has angered the militants who are holding these 2 men. The British Government and media has remained extremely quiet about the plight of these two captives.

All efforts must be made at the highest level to secure the release of these British subjects.

We are blogging this story and these lines that we are sending to No 10 today all over the planet in the next few days..

Action to receive this petition or reaction for not, your choice, we know politics..

Thank you and good night,

Regards,

Pastor Byron

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
